property.name: background-image
property.description: Background image for progress bars. Gradient supported.

property.name: border
property.description: The border that is drawn around progress bars.

property.name: border-top
property.description: The top side border for progress bars.

property.name: border-right
property.description: The right side border for progress bars.

property.name: border-bottom
property.description: The bottom side border for progress bars.

property.name: border-left
property.description: The left side border for progress bars.

property.name: border-radius
property.description: Border radius. The border radius has no effect if an enhanced border, like "inset" or "outset" is used.

property.name: width
property.description: Represents the width of the progress bar if it's vertical or the height, if it's horizontal.

style.name: VERTICAL
style.description: The indicator grows from bottom to top.

style.name: UNDETERMINED
style.description: Indicates that the state of progress is unkown.

element.name: ProgressBar-Indicator
element.description: The movable bar that indicates the progress

property.name: background-image
property.description: Background image for progress indicator. Gradient supported.

property.name: opacity
property.description: The opacity of the indicator. A value between 0 and 1.

style.name: VERTICAL
style.description: The indicator grows from bottom to top.

style.name: UNDETERMINED
style.description: Indicates that the state of progress is unkown.

state.name: disabled
state.description: Applies to the progress indicator of a disabled progress bar.

state.name: error
state.description: Applies to the progress indicator of a progress bar in ERROR state.

state.name: paused
state.description: Applies to the progress indicator of a progress bar in PAUSED state.
